entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Amqui
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Causapscal Airport 2:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
